title: Ryan Poised to Preserve Open N.Y. Democratic Seat as Schmitt Concedes
description: Representative Pat Ryan’s apparent win over a conservative Republican in New York’s 18th District on Tuesday came just a few months after he won a special election in the 19th District.
dc:creator: Grace Ashford
media:credit: Gregg Vigliotti for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Pat Ryan defeated a hard-right challenger, Colin Schmitt.
